text:
Is there  away using `varinfo` to only match an exact string.
```julia> Q = 10
10
julia> aQ = 10
10
julia> varinfo(Main, r"Q")
  name    size summary
  –––– ––––––– –––––––
  Q    8 bytes Int64
  aQ   8 bytes Int64```
but I just want to get that info on a single variable with an exact match, and can't figure out the regex that would do it.

elements.text: to only match an exact string.

julia> Q = 10
10
julia> aQ = 10
10
julia> varinfo(Main, r"Q")

but I just want to get that info on a single variable with an exact match, and can't figure out the regex that would do it.

text: Match the start (`^`) and end(`$`) too: `r"^Q$"`
